ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: I could tell ya but then I would have to kill ya and Miriana too! (just kiddin!) (inside joke: her guild and mine are fiendly rivals on the same server.) We
ygData.messageBody:
I could tell ya but then I would have to kill ya and Miriana too! (just
kiddin!) (inside joke: her guild and mine are fiendly rivals on the same
server.)

We got 3 nice swords last night that I dont think anybody else (on our
server) has. One is a big daddy Yk <eg>. Throneblade of Ykesha. 2HS 33 /
51, str + 6, int + 6 proc: Ykesha. Another is Jade Reaver 2HS 23/40, 12 wt,
war/pal/shd/rng. And also a Jade Broadsword 1HS 11 / 25 str+8 sv Poison+10
Disease+10

<a href="http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/kunark/pics/jadebs1.jpg">Anne got
the blade: http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/kunark/pics/jadebs1.jpg </a>

<a href="http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/kunark/pics/jadebs2.jpg">Yup it's
off-handable: http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/kunark/pics/jadebs2.jpg </a>

While we were doing CR, one of our team hailed this Guard in Firiona Vie:

"Guard Ivak says 'A fellow paladin who was a member of an expedition into
the jungles of Kunark returned with a Jade Green Broadsword. He said came
across it while they were fighting their way out of some ancient city filled
with golems. They lost many strong troops on that expedition. "

No kidding!

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 50 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly

p.s. we also located the guy who talks about getting to Veeshan. Stuff was
posted on casters realm by others:

"Hail Emporer Ganak.

Greeting..It has been long since I have been aware of this plane..Who are
you, and what do you want of I, Ganak, slayer of Jaled-Dar?

You wish to know of Veeshans Peak?! You are either very brave or very
foolish! There is nothing there for the uninvited but a fiery death. I have
been away from this plane of existance for a long time yet sill I feel the
presence of the ancient wurms. I am sure they sense my presence as well,
being as I hold the only [key to the Chambers] of the Ring of Scale."

p.s.s. If you are exploring and you find zone portals (assuming that you can
tell it's a portal before you zone) you might wanna duel down and pop in
nekkid, just in case it's a one-way portal guarded on the inside by some
mean and nastys. Although it's looking like the really scary ones: fight
your way in, one-way in and some other way out, insta-spawn mobs on evac
spells, keys to get in - nobody knows how to get out are not something you
are going to just stumble into. It's been a long time since I have been
this scared! Feels good.
